title: Adobe Edge Animate CC v2.0.0.250.24837 Final Multilanguage (WIN-
description:
All the description in these package are in Spanish and of course I only found out the spanish download version on this edge animate, but fortunately the setup file and the patch with cracks all are in english and no need to worry. Anyway, I translate the main instruction into english by google translate so don't take it on me if there's any translation error. the english version of instruction is in this location:

../Adobe Edge Animate CC v2.0.0.250.24837 Final Multilanguage (WIN-MAC)Adobe.Edge.Animate.CC.v2.0.0.250.24837.Final.Multilenguaje.Incl.Patch-PainteR

Finally, I patched my both adobe CC Edge Animate and install version by this package and everything worked perfect and smoothly. But I didn't try MAC version, if you installed it on your mac and you have any tip or comment, please feel free and enlighten your mac allies.
